document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">showed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Hights </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">never </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">saw </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Would'st </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Climb" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">-" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me"? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">showed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">secrets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Morning's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Nest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Rope </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Nights </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">put </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">across </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Would'st </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Guest"? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">find </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Yes" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">brake </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">lo, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">light </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">solemn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">glow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">steadier, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">withdrew </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">further </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"No"? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: He showed me hights I never saw
